title: Riddle 1 • CAFETERIA
clue: You came here because you’re hungry. Fair enough. But hunger doesn’t always look up.

title: Riddle 2 • STAIRCASE
clue: This place only exists to take you somewhere else. Nobody actually stays here. So… what did everyone ignore?
